title: A Sydney gym is hosting a singles night for fitness fanatics as an alternative to dating apps
text:
A newly opened Sydney gym is hosting a free, fitness focused 'Date Night' for singles, complete with personalised workouts, thumping nightclub music - and no dating apps in sight.

Fitbeat, a group training gym in Sydney's CBD, aims to 'take the guesswork out of dating' by giving people the chance to socialise in person instead of through the phone.

Guests can bring a partner or ask to be matched with a blind date on the night, where you sweat together through an exhilarating 48-minute workout of your choice.

The adults-only event takes place at 6.30pm on Friday November 8, and can be registered for on Fitbeat's official website.

Fitbeat, a newly opened gym in Sydney's CBD, is hosting a fitness focused 'Date Night' for singles, complete with personalised workouts and thumping nightclub music (stock image)

The gym (pictured) hopes to encourage singles to socialise in person instead of through online dating apps

Participants can choose between a cardio focused session, designed for weight loss and building stamina, and a weight-lifting resistance circuit for muscle growth and strength.

Fitbeat founder Mike Kunitz said the gym's social focus sets it apart from other facilities.

'At Fitbeat, we are all about doing things differently by offering the world's first personalised group training workouts that are tailored to your long-term fitness goal,' he told FEMAIL.

Guests can bring a partner or request to be matched with a blind date on the night

'Fitbeat is a very sociable gym, so we thought we would do all the heavy lifting for our clients by organising a 'Date Night' for them, where they get to enjoy a workout with their partner or potential partner.

'With pumping playlists and synchronised lighting, Fitbeat is a pretty fun place for 'Date Night'!

'With your blood flow already increasing, this will definitely heighten your experience.'
description: A newly launched gym in central Sydney is hosting a free, fitness focused 'date night' for singles, complete with personalised workouts, thumping nightclub music and no dating apps in sight.
authors: Alice Murphy For Daily Mail Australia
